map.objective: Destroy the enemy teams' bed and eliminate them before they get to yours.

message.text: `bYour sword has been upgraded to `4`lSharpness I`r`b!
`bYour armour has been upgraded to `9`lProtection I`r`b!
`bYour armour has been upgraded to `9`lProtection II`r`b!
`bYour armour has been upgraded to `9`lProtection III`r`b!
`bYour armour has been upgraded to `9`lProtection IV`r`b!
`bYour resource generator has been upgraded to `e`lLevel I`r`b!
`bYour resource generator has been upgraded to `e`lLevel II`r`b!
`bYour resource generator has been upgraded to `e`lLevel III`r`b!
`bYour resource generator has been upgraded to `e`lLevel IV`r`b!
`bYour team's base now has a `3`lFreeze Trap`r`b!
`bYour team's base now has a `7`lMining Fatigue Trap`r`b!
`bYour team's base now has an `d`lAlarm Trap`r`b!
`bYou are immune to traps for `c30 seconds`b!
`bYou are now vulnerable to traps as your immunity worn off!

broadcasts.alert: `bDiamond Generators`r have been upgraded to Tier `cII`r.
`bDiamond Generators`r have been upgraded to Tier `cIII`r.
`2Emerald Generators`r have been upgraded to Tier `cII`r.
`2Emerald Generators`r have been upgraded to Tier `cIII`r.
The world border will appear in `c10 minutes`r.
The world border has appeared and is approaching!

apply.message: You are not allowed to modify terrain here!
You are not allowed to block the spawners!
You may not edit outside the map!
You can only modify blocks placed by a player!

proximity-alarm.message: An enemy has been detected in your base!
An enemy has been detected in your base!
An enemy has been detected in your base!
An enemy has been detected in your base!

item.name: `rPermanent Shears
item.lore: `7Great for getting rid of wool.

item.name: `rFireball
item.lore: `7Right-click to launch! Great for|`7knocking off enemies walking on|`7thin bridges.
`7Instantly ignites once placed.

item.name: `rPermanent Shears
item.lore: `7Great for getting rid of wool.

item.name: `rFireball
item.lore: `7Right-click to launch! Great for|`7knocking off enemies walking on|`7thin bridges.
`7Instantly ignites once placed.
`7The quickest way to invade enemy bases.
`7Great for slowing down approaching|`7enemies. Can also protect|`7against TNT.

item.name: `r`aMagic Milk
item.lore: `7Avoid triggering traps for 30|`7seconds after consuming.

item.name: `4`lSharpened Swords
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Sharpness I on all swords and|`7axes.

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor I
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection I on all armor pieces.

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor II
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection II on all armor pieces.

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor III
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection III on all armor pieces.

item.name: `e`lReinforced Armor IV
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection IV on all armor pieces.

item.name: `6`lHaste I
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste I.

item.name: `6`lHaste II
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste II.

item.name: `b`lResource Generator Upgrade I
item.lore: `7This upgrade increases your resource|`7generator's speed to 150%.

item.name: `b`lResource Generator Upgrade II
item.lore: `7This upgrade increases your resource|`7generator's speed to 200%.

item.name: `b`lResource Generator Upgrade III
item.lore: `7This upgrade will spawn emeralds in your|`7resource generator.

item.name: `b`lResource Generator Upgrade IV
item.lore: `7This upgrade increases your resource|`7generator's speed to 300%.

item.name: `c`lRegenerative Pool
item.lore: `7Creates a Regeneration field|`7around your base.

item.name: `3`lFreeze Trap
item.lore: `7Enemies who enter your base will receive|`75 seconds of Slowness and Blindness.

item.name: `d`lAlarm Trap
item.lore: `7Enemies who enter your base will|`7set off a Proximity Alarm and|`7be revealed if invisible.

item.name: `7`lMining Fatigue Trap
item.lore: `7Enemies who enter your base will|`7receive Mining Fatigue.
